title: Our Server will hook you up with Duo partners and Teams regardless of your rank

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Hi everyone,

I'm Trin, I own the Oceanic Discord Server for League of Legends.

We're here to make it easier for the community to hook themselves up with partners and teams.
Once you join the Discord Server, if you provide proof of your rank by DMing me you'll then be given a Discord role based on your rank.
This means that you'll be given access to a specific chat filled with many people of the same rank.

So far we're acquired over 1,400 members on the server, so there's no shortage of players, and we guarantee you that you'll find the person you're looking to play with.

The server includes multiple voice channels for you and your friends to play with and much more!

Link to join: https://discord.gg/czRnHKV

http://i67.tinypic.com/2pyyhjc.png

replies.body: I'm reported you to the community mods on this forum, your behavior is unacceptable.
I hope you get banned off league, for your actions today, have a great day!
This is a great server guys I recommend joining!!
Hey, sorry to bother you. I just join the LoL OCE DIscord. I was reading the rules. I am chat muted? What do I need to do to join?

> [{quoted}](name=Osen,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=u099ZB9E,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-02-08T02:11:31.572+0000)
>
> Hey, sorry to bother you. I just join the LoL OCE DIscord. I was reading the rules. I am chat muted? What do I need to do to join?

You're unmuted now. New members get muted for a bit.
